subject: brake pedal replacement parts
description_text:
Hi there,
This may be an odd inquiry but I was wondering if I would be able to
purchase a few parts on their own? as I bought a set of simsonn pedals
second hand and they seem to be missing only a few things.

I've attached an image of the parts as I'm not sure what they would be
named, the parts are inside the red box and are the black spring and the
backing plate the spring sits against.
I'm not sure if I'm missing more parts from the brake so I've also
attached some images of the brake elastomers as they currently are.

I would be happy to pay for these replacement parts if it's available to do
so.

Thanks very much,
Thomas Steven

conversations.body_text: Hi Thomas Steven,  You are missing the spring and stainless steel support parts. I will check on this and get back to you.

Hi Thomas Steven,    I have confirmed with our warehouse staff that one spring, the last clip, and one gasket are missing. Please confirm.  If there are no issues, you can click on this link to pay the fees.    https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

Hi there,

I don't see any issues or missing parts so I've gone ahead and put the
order through, thank you very much for all of your help and allowing me to
buy these parts separately.

Thanks again,
Thomas Steven
